components.description: A silver spoon, as used to eat soup, cereal, or ice cream as well as serve food or stir drinks. Positioned at various angles across platforms. May be paired with Fork and Knife, Fork and Knife With Plate, and Bowl With Spoon.
components.title: Spoon

description: A silver spoon, as used to eat soup, cereal, or ice cream as well as serve food or stir drinks. Positioned at various angles across platforms. May be paired with Fork and Knife, Fork and Knife With Plate, and Bowl With Spoon.
title: Spoon

version.description:
The Unicode Consortium accepted the following emoji 72 emojis for Unicode 9.0. This update was released on June 21, 2016. Most vendors added support for this update within the 2016 calendar year. Sample images and more about Unicode 9.0.

Emoji 4.0 was published in late 2016, which added additional emoji professions.

New in Unicode 9

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Miscellaneous mark
emoji_net_data.definition: A silver spoon, that can be used for soft or liquid foods, such as soup, or dessert. Often paired with the fork and knife. Spoon was approve http://emojipedia.org/spoon/
emoji_net_data.name: spoon

bn:00093943v: Snuggle and lie in a position where one person faces the back of the others

bn:00094169v: Scoop up or take up with a spoon

bn:00073547n: An implement for eating or serving; a scooped utensil whose long handle is straight, in contrast to a ladle.
An implement for eating or serving, a small bowl with a long straight handle.
A piece of cutlery with a shallow bowl-shaped container and a handle; used to stir or serve or take up food
Spoon, a term for an eating utensil that is considered an inherently funny word, has been featured in many quotations.
A spoon is a utensil consisting of a small shallow bowl, oval or round, at the end of a handle.

bn:00075834n: Plates, dishes and other eating and serving tableware, usually made of some ceramic material.
Tableware is the dishes or dishware used for setting a table, serving food and dining.
The eating and serving utensils such as knives, forks and spoons.
Articles for use at the table (dishes and silverware and glassware)
Plates used for setting a table and serving food
Crockery used for serving or cooking food
The cutlery, crockery and glassware used in setting a table for a meal.
